about_the_game:
Welcome to Eros Raiders, the ultimate fusion of waifus, sci-fi, mechas and hentai!

Recruit and train your team of beautiful full animated female pilots and explore pretty hot stories.

Get ready for thrilling 5 vs. 5 3D turn-based mecha battles, piloted by stunning women who want nothing more than to get in your sheets.

Perfect for fans of anime, RPGs, JRPGs and mechas, Eros Raiders offers a rich and, above all, attractive experience that will keep you hooked for hours.

Key Features

Recruit and Train Your Waifus

  • Beautiful Waifus: Recruit a diverse cast of Waifus, each with unique abilities, personalities and “ tastes”. From fierce warriors to cunning strategists, find the perfect team for your play style, or simply choose the ones that warm your heart (or ANY other part of your body) the most.

  • Training and Enhancement: Train your pilots to improve their power and performance in combat. Develop their skills, unlock new abilities, and customize their appearance to suit your "preferences".

  • Strategic Combats: Turn-Based Action: Plan and execute strategies to defeat your opponents in intense 5v5 battles. Use your tactical prowess to outmaneuver and outsmart your enemies.

  • Giant Mechas: Unleash the power of your mechas and use special abilities to turn the tide of battle. Command awe-inspiring robots equipped with cutting-edge technology and devastating weaponry.

  • 3D Battles: Experience immersive 3D combat with stunning visual effects. Enjoy dynamic, action-packed battles that bring the excitement of mecha warfare to life.

Diverse Game Modes

  • Adventure Mode: Experience the main story and discover the secrets of the cosmos. Participate in epic missions, get to know your soldiers intimately and immerse yourself in a narrative that encompasses all the stars.

  • Challenge Mode: Face unique daily challenges to test your skills. Every day brings new obstacles and rewards, pushing you to strategize and adapt.

  • League Mode (PvP): Battle other players, climb the ranks, and earn exclusive rewards. Prove your worth in competitive matches and rise to the top of the leaderboards.

  • Event Mode: Participate in limited-time events with thematic side stories and special rewards. Celebrate seasons and holidays with unique challenges and exclusive content.

Immersive Experience

  • High Quality Graphics: Enjoy stunning visual effects and fluid animations. Marvel at the detailed environments, explosive battle sequences, beautiful character designs and the “interesting” situations in which they end.

  • Deep narrative: Immerse yourself in a rich and captivating story that will keep you on the edge (of your seat, of course).

  • Explore a universe full of mystery, danger and adventure, alongside your beloved girls who will help you when you need it, if you do the same for them, of course.

content_descriptors.notes:
The content present in Eros Raiders contains explicit scenes and dialogues of sexual acts and nudity intended for adults only. All characters depicted in-game are of age. 

All sexual relations are consensual. 

It is possible that BDSM-related themes may be found in some scenes. Specifically. All the characters in the BDSM scenes have consensual sexual relations.

name: Eros Raiders

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Welcome to Eros Raiders, the ultimate fusion of waifus, sci-fi, mechas and hentai!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian
